name: U.B.S.F
description:
<--- U.B.S.F --->

A short metroidvania-like platformer for Nokia Jam 4!

Try and reach the exit while collecting upgrades and completing short platforming sections, you only have 3 lives though so beware!

Credit for all sound and music from Trix's Sound Pack from the Jam Resources!

Also don't try running into the quit portal on the main screen if you are on the web version as the game will crash and you will have to refresh the page.

<--- Controls --->

WASD or Arrow Keys: Move

Z:  Shoot Gun

Space: Jump

S or Down Arrow: Crouch

Alt + Enter: Toggle fullscreen on desktop version (Not recommended honestly)

<--- Mechanics--->

Upgrades affect your characters ability to traverse.

Springs increase jump height

Bombs increase gun power

Open eyes turn on switchable blocks

Closed eyes turn off switchable blocks
